CustomField.description: The API name for the field that will store a Point Type's Months Until Expiration value (e.g. MileMonthsuntilexpiration__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the API name for the field that will store your Point Type's Months Until Expiration value (e.g. MileMonthsuntilexpiration__c).
CustomField.label: Months Until Expiration Field
